name: @continuum/jtag
description: Production-grade universal debugging system. One import = console routing + WebSocket logging + screenshot capture. Zero config, works everywhere.
author: Continuum Development Team

scripts.start: npm run clean:dist && npm run build && npm run version:bump && npx tsx examples/end-to-end-demo.ts
scripts.build:mcp: npx tsc mcp/jtag-mcp-server.ts --outDir mcp --target ES2020 --module commonjs --esModuleInterop
scripts.test: npm run clean:dist && npm run build && npm run test:all
scripts.system:stop: lsof -ti:9002 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true; lsof -ti:9001 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run build:browser
scripts.test:verify: echo 'ðŸŽ¯ All JTAG tests passed!' && npm run test:show-logs
scripts.test:show-logs: echo 'ðŸ“‹ Log files created:' && ls -la ../../../.continuum/jtag/logs/ || true
scripts.test:layer-1: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 1: Foundation Tests' && npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/transport-abstraction.test.ts && npx tsx tests/layer-1-foundation/console-mapping.test.ts
scripts.test:layer-2: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 2: Daemon Processes' && npx tsx tests/layer-2-daemon-processes/console-routing-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:layer-4: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 4: System Integration' && npm run test:standalone && npm run test:module
scripts.test:layer-6: echo 'ðŸ§… Layer 6: Browser Integration' && npm run system:wait && npx tsx tests/layer-6-browser-integration/browser-automation-test.ts
scripts.test:unit:transports: echo 'ðŸ”„ Unit: Transport Iterator Tests' && npx tsx tests/unit/transport-iterator.test.ts
scripts.test:integration:browser: echo 'ðŸŒ Integration: Browser Transport Iterator' && npm run system:wait && npx tsx tests/integration/browser-transport-iterator.test.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:unit:transports && npm run test:layer-1 && npm run test:layer-2 && npm run test:layer-4 && npm run test:integration:browser && npm run test:verify
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:logs && npm run clean:screenshots && rm -rf dist/ 2>/dev/null || true
